## ERROR TIPS

### Placement validation errors
- Verify terrain is clear and placeable before attempting to place entities
- Check for water or existing entities in target placement area
- Use proper spacing between entities (especially 2x2 and 3x3 buildings)

### Assembling machine placement issues
- Ensure adequate space (3x3 tiles) is available for assembling machines
- Clear area completely before placing assembling machines
- Verify assembler placement doesn't interfere with existing production lines

### Resource detection errors
- Validate resource presence before attempting mining operations
- Use proper search radius when scanning for resource patches
- Handle cases where no valid resources are found

### Variable handling errors
- Ensure all variables are properly defined before use
- Maintain consistent variable naming conventions
- Initialize variables with default values when appropriate

### Power plant construction errors (continued)
- Verify water source availability before placing offshore pumps
- Plan complete power plant layout before starting construction
- Remove all obstructions from construction area

### Entity placement retry logic
- Implement proper fallback positions when primary placement fails
- Include validation checks after placement attempts
- Handle placement failures gracefully with recovery options

### Distance-related errors (continued)
- Verify player is within operational range before interactions
- Use intermediate waypoints for distant operations
- Check relative positions before attempting entity placement
